description:
On the 7th Floor of King George, the Tudor Hall Restaurant offers the finest and most elegant Contemporary Cuisine.  

The décor prevailing at Tudor Hall mirrors the decoration of the King George - an environment of elegance and comfort. The outdoor area offers a breathtaking view of Athens, the ancient city so rich in history it echoes through the modern day identity. Spectate the fabled Acropolis and regal Syntagma Square with views that capture the essence of the ancients in the historic city center.  

At Tudor Hall, dishes of Contemporary Cuisine are enhanced by the exquisite accompaniment of the finest Greek & International wines.
name: Tudor Hall

description:
The Wine Caravan.

Two women with passion for wine, travel and adventure, meet and their vision takes shape.
We are Leoni and Anna, two women with passion for wine, travel and adventure. Through our page we would like to project our vision and our love for unpretentiously nice food of our place and our aesthetics for life. We enjoy traveling as well as discovering new destinations, cultures of indigenous tribes and their culinary habits. When we’re not running around and finding some free time, then all roads lead to a trip.

Our message is:

“Get off your feet away from the chair, the couch, the desk. Leave the cell phone, tablet, computer and go outside. See the colors of nature. Breathe fresh air. Lead an amazing life! Make this passage through life, the most exciting adventure.”

This is the journey for us. This is Caravin. This is life.
name: Caravin Wine & Wanderlust

description: Thes ''Greek Creative Cuisine'' opened it's doors on July of 2019. This was the start for our gastronomic trip. Our mission was and still is to open our "big house", a warm restaurant that serves Greek Creative Cuisine with the best hospitality. Our friendly team, their big smiles and passion is what makes Thes ''Greek Creative Cuisine'' unique. Our signature dishes are some traditional Greek recipes "remade" with a fresh touch. And our small secret? No one leaves the restaurant without a small treat! Some traditional ice cream or a glass of "mastic" is the perfect goodbye for us (always combined with a big smile)! Book your table with us :)
name: Thes "Greek Creative Cuisine"

description: Our eatery is located under the Ancient Acropolis and adjacent to the renowned Acropolis Museum. It is easily accessible from the nearby metro station exiting on the pedestrian walkway of Makrigianni street. We offer a variety of Greek cuisine from starters "meze", fresh salads, traditional main courses (mousaka, giouvetsi, stuffed vine leaves & more) and grilled meat skewers. We specialize in procuring and preparing fresh fish and sea food daily: Sea bass, grouper, sea bream, shrimp, mussels, octopus among others. You will find a wide and extensive list of fine wines to pair with your choices. Professional multilingual staff will tend to your needs. Come and taste our renowned Greek hospitality!
name: Elaea Dine & Wine
rankingString: #19 of 3,608 places to eat in Athens

description: Let's travel! Visit different beautiful corners of our planet by savoring their dishes here! Every place on earth is filled with happy moments and mind-blowing flavors. Food is one of the best indulgences in life, a discovery, a delight to the palate, and a learning experience. Every country has wonderful foodstuff, which is unique, either because of the way it is made or because of where it grows. We choose some of these for you to taste, favorites from around the globe. We are proud to prepare for your global food journey, with dishes full of history and stories. Our food is: Nutritious, healthy & wholesome - home food made with care Made with fresh & flavorful ingredients – we prepare daily Simple– you know what you are eating and is well described for you Relish a friendly service in a relaxing environment. Tells us your favorite food and we will make it for you and your friends.
name: A Little Taste Of Home

description: When was the last time you did something for the first time? How far would you go to take the perfect selfie, watch the sunset under the Acropolis’ eye, have the time of your life with your friends or set your romantic dinner date above the city lights? Launched in Brussels back in 2006, Dinner in the Sky, with a presence in more than 60 countries, started its operation in Athens in 2015. Since that time we have welcomed more than 16.000 guests from all over the world and have been rated as one of the Best Restaurants in Athens! Dinner in the Sky is a multi-awarded extraordinary culinary proposal that welcomes 22 guests along with our Chefs who are preparing a 6 course menu lifts you up to 40 meters offering a once in a life time experience. Dinner in the Sky takes you to heaven, while the nightlife of Athens “awakens”. As the table slowly rotates you get views ranging from the sculpturally lit Acropolis, the surrounding mountains, the sea and of course the Athenian cityscape.
name: Dinner in the Sky

description: The restaurant is a perfectly restored villa from the early years of the previous century. The decor strikes the perfect balance between luxury and ambience, creating an atmosphere which is quite formal but still unpretentious, cozy and elegant. The restaurant's creative cuisine has been awarded many times and promises to impress you with a brilliant parade of re-synthesized Greek cuisine The chef Gikas Xenakis is one of the best proponents of the New Greek Cuisine movement which now attracts the most talented chefs in Greece. His philosophy is one that combines a calm but confident control of the modern cooking techniques with his memories of traditional home food cooked with the best and freshest ingredients that the sea and land of Greece offers. At Aleria you will enjoy Greek fine dining in wonderful surroundings in what is considered as one of the best value for money restaurants.
name: Aleria

address: Anastassiou Zinni 29-31 Dimitrakopoulou, next to Fix Metro Station, Athens 117 41 Greece
description: Three brothers with extensive business activities decided to join their forces and their passion and created an amazing tavern! A unique and very welcoming place with delicious traditional Greek cuisine that you will simply adore! Homemade food, delicious seafood and appetizers, along with a variety of grilled meat is what you will taste in "Dyo Dekares i Oka", as this cozy tavern is called. Its name means "two dimes an oca", with oca being an old mass measurement unit, and will take you to the past. The flavours will do the same, as they resemble of an old, experienced Greek housewife's way of cooking. Pure ingredients, rich spices and lots of imagination are shuffled daily to offer you original culinary experiences. As for the space? Simple, cozy and welcoming. With beautiful decorative details that will make you feel intimate, like if you ate at a friend's house. At the evening, live music makes the mood take off. People become one... they celebrate, they dance and sing, as only Greeks know how to do! Create memories and take them back home when you leave this country... Many smiles, kindness, delicious flavours and affordable prices are what you should expect from your visit at "Dyo Dekares i Oka" restaurant. And we're sure that if you ever come back in Greece, then you'll definitely come back to the tavern as well.
name: Dyo Dekares i Oka
rankingString: #46 of 3,608 places to eat in Athens

description: In the heart of Athens, at the conjunction of Kolokotroni and Leocharous streets, lies Amber Athens ! A new concept urban restaurant bar, designed by architect Michael Papadakis and manager Tasos Golikidis this special venue offers an all-day destination for those who are looking for a unique aesthetic and culinary experience. The source of inspiration of this unique space - with several custom made creations - is what its name states: the gemstone of amber. In addition to its famous use as a jewel since ancient times, amber has the ability to preserve within it various of the beauties of its surroundings.
name: Amber Athens

we are a traditional Greek restaurant. Since 2004 we are serving to our guests the best of Greek cuisine with high quality homemade food.
If you've been to our restaurant, you've seen and and tasted what keeps our customers coming back for more. Perfect materials and freshly baked food, delicious skewers, moussaka and fish make us hard to resist! Stop in today and check us our! Our restaurant offers a unique Greek atmosphere in which you can linger in our dining area with our assortment of lunch and dinner items.
Since last year we are gluten free dedicated.

description: Grocery · Restaurant · Fromagerie · Charcuterie “Ta Karamanlidika tou Fani” brings you the traditional tastes of Byzantium & Cappadokia, right on your table. At Fromagerie you may buy from our carefully selected collection of aged greek cheese. At Charcuterie you may taste the awarded “Sary” cold cuts. At Grocery you can select from a variety of exceptional gourmet, PDO and PGA food products of small scale, Greek producers. At Restaurant, our Menu includes aperitifs, salads, cheese & ham varieties, cold & hot dishes and desert, accompanied by a selection of distilled beverages and wines of local grape varieties. Fish lovers will enjoy Greek cured or smoked fish of high quality, such as anchovies, sardine, eel, trout, salmon and sturgeon. Specialties include traditionally cured, seasoned and aged ham, pastirma, sujuk, prosciutto, sausages, pastrami, PDO & aged cheese and extra-fine olive oil.
name: Ta Karamanlidika tou Fani

description: Arcadia restaurant on Makrygianni street, right opposite the Acropolis Museum, is a popular destination for good food since 1977. Traditional Greek recipes from the region of Arcadia in the Peloponnese and not only, prepared with fresh local products, extra virgin olive oil and fresh local meat. The menu varies depending on the season and includes specialties such as goat with oregano, veal cooked in a special ceramic pot with goats cheese, kleftiko lamb and cockerel in wine with thick pasta. You can also taste delicious veal patties, grilled lamb ribs, steaks, pork or chicken marinated souvlaki and fresh fried potatoes, home made pasta and a variety of fish. Open for lunch and dinner and during the summer season also for breakfast.
name: Arcadia Restaurant

description: - "To Trikyklo" (tricycle) is a cafeteria- tavern- bar, located next to the park of the Lambrakis hill, at the pedestrian of Pytheou str., in a renovated two-floor stone building of 1931, with its own yard and tables outside, on the pedestrian street in the summer. We are located very close to the Acropolis Museum and the Temple of Zeus. Although outside the tourist area of downtown Athens, we are very close to it on foot. The menu consists of authentic Greek and Mediterranean recipes, prepared with love and creativity. --All Greek (and other) spirits served, are carefully selected!
name: To Trikyklo
rankingString: #103 of 3,608 places to eat in Athens

description: The location that started it all for us. Located in the area of Keratsini in Peireas, it is favored by all the locals for fresh fish. Our motto is “If our fish were any fresher they would be swimming in the sea” and rightfully so. Our daily selection of fresh fish varies on what the local sea had to offer and what the fishermen caught for us. A warm and friendly seafood restaurant that has been a staple for many years for the local residents of Peiraias that appreciate the quality, the atmosphere and the prices.

description: 2 Mazi is a Greek creative cuisine restaurant. On the outskirts of Plaka , at 48 Nikis str. Owner Elias Gogos creative and persistent advocate of quality, his inspiration sources from the finest products of our land. Meat , fish , handmade pasta and traditional pies tangle up with herbs and edible flowers each one of special taste and therapeutic value. Small producers delicatessen from all over Greece, could not be absent from our kitchen. We have set the bar high, hoping to convey our deep love for good food.Our goal is to awaken all your senses , to reconstitute familiar but forgotten flavors and create new. We look forward to see you to our restaurant, a beautiful 19 th century neoclassical building for remembering the time that life had the ” flavor of the party”. You and us…..2 TOGETHER because that’s what counts after all!
name: 2MAZI Restaurant

description: VINTAGE holds over 1200 labels with 850 of them served by the glass, which is quite phenomenal in worldwide scale and makes the world's largest “by the glass” list. Especially worth mentioning is the fact that legendary fine wines are also available by the glass (yes, Petrus too). One of the three cellars is dedicated to aged, very rare Greek wines - both red and white ones - with very impressive collection on Santorini wines and hundreds of Magnum bottles. FOOD at VINTAGE: we are dedicated to treating outstanding ingredients with the lowest amount of intervention. We create mediterranean dishes that find the perfect balance between simplicity and deliciousness (i.e. grilled milk-fed lamb, truffled split pea puree, octopus in wine, triple cooked potaoes with feta & oregano, croquettes with Greek jamon iberico). List of over 30 cheeses and charcuteries keep the spirit of our menu relaxed and timeless. Additionally each cheese platter is custom made.
name: Vintage Wine Bar & Bistro

description:
Στην Ελλάδα το καλό φαγητό και η καλή παρέα είναι κομμάτι της παράδοσης μας.

Τραπέζι με την οικογένεια, με φίλους και μεζέδες της γιαγιάς. Σε μια εποχή που όλα δείχνουν πρόχειρα και γρήγορα, εμείς στον Zahoulis μένουμε πιστοί σε γεύσεις που βρήκαμε από τους προγόνους μας και θα κάνουμε ότι μπορούμε για να μείνουμε πιστοί στην παράδοση, στις αρχές και την ποιότητα που ακολουθεί το εδώ και 10 
χρόνια.

Η ελληνική δημιουργική κουζίνα είναι βασισμένη στα υλικά άριστης ποιότητας και την άρτια παρασκευή.

Σας περιμένουμε όλους να δοκιμάσετε τις παραδοσιακές μας γεύσεις!

In Greece, good food and good company are part of our tradition.

Table with the family, with friends and grandma's snacks. years.

description: Welcome to the oldest restaurant in Athens, the legendary "Vassilenas", where the likes of Winston Churchill, Sophia Loren and many others have dined. After 96 years in our original location near the Pireaus port, in 2016 we moved to central Athens, close to the Hilton Hotel. Our captivating new "home", designed by acclaimed Greek architects Maria Kokkinou and Andreas Kourkoulas serves creative Greek cuisine with quality ingredients and using modern culinary techniques in a unique environment. Weather permitting, our pop-up Vassilenas Parkside welcomes you in the lovely park of Madrid Square, just across the street.

description: Greeks tend to associate pleasure with homemade food, quality wine and good company. That’s why they are always searching for a special hangout that combines the intimate atmosphere of home with their mama’s kitchen aromas. At the traditional, family-owned Gods’ Restaurant, you will feel right at home with the rustic and hospitable atmosphere, but it is the father who heads the kitchen here. With 40 years of cooking experience, he works alongside the executive chef to create authentic Greek recipes, like the traditional finger-licking dolmades (meat and rice wrapped in grapevine leaves with egg and lemon sauce), the famous Lamb "kleftiko" in the pot or the ancient Greek recipe, fried feta cheese wrapped in phyllo pastry with honey and black sesame. In Gods’ Restaurant your culinary experience won’t be anything other than divine.
name: Gods' Restaurant

description: CHE.MA.: Neologism from the words Chemistry & Mathematics. The precisely calculated & designed mix of edible & drinkable ingredients to produce the perfect gastronomic result to quench your senses! For the past 15 years the brothers Tolis Brikes (Chemist) & Babis Brikes (Mathematician) have been addressing meat lovers and satisfying the most demanding palates in their restaurants in Palaia Fokaia & Alimos. Dishes made with the finest and freshest raw materials, cooked with the highest level of know-how, taste, love and respect for the customer. The great experience passed down by their butcher father played a big part in the excellent selection of meats one can taste in their restaurants. Each dish described in this menu is a unique culinary experience with a focus on the good meat you need to experience. All dishes are served with mathematical precision and chemical balance! Have a great time!

description:
A “royal” street food restaurant that invites you to join a culinary journey from beautiful Ioannina to distant Serres, with smells and flavors from many intermediate stations that will surely be unforgettable! 

Black pig in a straw, juicy buffalo burgers, famous Florina kebap, smoked trout fillet and eel wrapped in a fluffy corn pie sided with handmade fava beans, capers, and lemon sauce are just some of the many delicious “5 stars on the go” dishes that you can taste during your visit. 

Take a look at the wide variety of handmade sauces and save some space for our own Ajvar sauce (originating from the Balkans), the famous sweet paprika sauce, and the homemade fava beans. 

Keep in mind to ask for a tour of our cellar, known as “katagogi”, and taste our selected biodynamic wines and “tsipouro” from original Greek distilleries. 

*All meat products are chosen from small-scale Greek farmers.
name: Prigkipas Exarcheia
rankingString: #127 of 3,608 places to eat in Athens

description: È arrivato Zampanò. A new entry on the gastronomy map of Athens. Inspired by the main character of Federico Fellini's masterpiece "La Strada," Zampanò takes traditional Greek cuisine to a new level with modern, creative elements always based on fresh, seasonal ingredients from all around the country. Our extensive list of wines will satisfy even the most demanding wine lover. We have carefully selected the best wine-making producers from around Greece to bring you the finest and most representative varieties. If you are in a funkier mood, our fully equiped bar has an extensive list of cocktails and spirits to get you covered.
name: Zampano

description: The view from the GB Roof Garden Restaurant & Bar is breathtaking. In the most ideal location, the uninterrupted views of the Acropolis, Lycabettus hill and the Parliament are truly magnificent. The Restaurant - awarded by the Wine Spectator magazine three years in a row - serves New Mediterranean cuisine with emphasis on quality raw materials and excellent technique. For breakfast or lunch, the elegant and warm environment of the GB Roof Garden restaurant creates a tranquil atmosphere, while dinner is perfect when the city lights come on and the cosmopolitan aura becomes apparent.

description:
22 χρόνια εστιατόρια, όλα τα φαγητά που σερβίρουμε είναι χειροποίητα και από εκλεκτά και ποιοτικά υλικά. Σερβίρουμε επίσης δωρεάν γλυκό της ημέρας. Ο χώρος του εστιατόριου είναι ευπρόσδεκτος και φιλόξενος για όλους τους ανθρώπους ανεξαρτήτως ηλικίας, όπως και για ΑΜΕΑ. 
Επιπρόσθετα όλες οι σάλτσες μας, 11 στο σύνολο είχε χειροποίητες χωρισ συντηρητικά οπωσ και η αραβική πίτα μας, την οποία ζυμώνουμε εμείς καθημερινά στο χέρι. Υπάρχει άνετο πάρκινγκ και το μαγαζί βρίσκεται σε χαμηλότερο επίπεδο από τον δρόμο.

description: The 'station' of the quality and taste in Athens In the center of Athens, just 5 minutes from Omonia Square, just off the Metro at Larissa station, opposite the train station in Samos Highway 72 is the 'Station'. The beautiful our room Square Park with skyline in the Attic sky, among the trees and in an environment with scents of basil and blooming jasmine in the colors of flowery vokavilias and many flowers is one of relaxation and pleasure oasis in the city center . Our place has warm in winter and cool in summer. From morning until midnight Taste Gyro (pork or chicken), souvlaki (pork - chicken, -kempap, sausage-chickenbacon-Meatballs with pepper -burger with cheese) all and pie(Pita), and bread (sandwich) and portions (dish) and even lamb chops or chicken, pork chops, burgers (pork or chicken), pork chops accompanying with tzatziki sauce or handmade and Greek salad and many other salads, and fresh potatoes and Greek Feta. All our products are of excellent quality at very low prices offered for the road Even enjoy coffees, drinks, Greek and international beer brands in frozen glasses and traditional Greek drinks, white wine or red, Ouzo and Raki(Tsipouro) The multitudinous our foreign customers touristes- travelers and residents of the surrounding hotels all over the world with their posts in Through our Social Networking declared as:> Our store is located in the center of Athens: Opposite THE TRAIN STATION LARISSA, just off the METRO LARISSA, beside the OSCAR HOTEL. description: “Oinopoleion”… means Wine-shop. From the Winery straight to your table! A traditional wine-restaurant with a long history since 1928 where wine holds the leading role since it is an actual branch of the Attican Winery “Markou Vineyards”. At “Oinopoleion” you can drink wine by the glass or by the carafe or bottled offering a variety of both indigenous and foreign grape varieties which are grown exclusively at the Markou family’s vineyards and all aim to please even the most demanding palettes. The Markou winery’s wines are accompanied by finely executed delicious dishes, made of the freshest Mediterranean ingredients and based on Greece’s vast regional cuisine.
name: Oinopoleion

description: Porto Grill is a two - storey restaurant situated in the heart of Piraeus’ port, inside one of the most beautiful old buildings of the city (from the early 1900`s), which has been respectfully and elegantly restored. As you enter our place you are welcomed by a magnificent setting, a delightful marriage of antique stone walls and the luxuries of modernity. That’s indeed why our restaurant is the favorite hangout place for travelers coming from both the port and the train station, either people working and leaving in Piraeus. The menu offers a wide variety of excellent traditional Greek dishes, along with fine local wines and deserts. All our products are fresh and the dishes have the warmth of home-made food. As suits such a popular restaurant, our friendly and pleasant staff will make sure you enjoy your meal the best way possible, while understanding your need for both relaxation and comfort.
name: Porto Grill Piraeus
rankingString: #8 of 452 places to eat in Piraeus

address: 1 Plateia Iroon Psirri, Monastiraki, Athens 105 54 Greece
description: BeerTime is a premium casual Restaurant located in the heart of "old Athens" Psiri - 3 mins walk from Monastiraki metro or train stations, 5 mins walk from Omonia or 10 mins walk from Syntagma. - housed in a listed building which was built in 1826. With a focus on using fresh local ingredients whenever possible, all menu items are handcrafted in house to provide the freshest food possible. beertime is proud to offer Athens largest selection of Greek microbrews, Bavarian monastery breweries, an extensive list of European brews and American IPA's along with an list of cocktails and spirits. Our philosophy : "Think Global, Support Local". How did we implement our philosophy? By creating a warm, authentic beer house that serves Fresh Beer (having its own glass-enclosed keg room) and offers Fresh Local Food from an open-space kitchen. Fresh Beer - The Perfect Pour -. What does this mean to you? Your beer will be served at the proper temperature to ensure all the flavors you'd miss with a standard system are there for you to enjoy from the first sip. Some quick facts about our draft system: • Our custom built keg room can house 20 kegs. • Approximately 300 litres of beer chilled at the perfect temperature 2-4 degrees. • Our draft system is designed so that the temperature of the beer is exactly the same in the keg room as it is when we pour it from our taps. • Our in house certified draft beer technician cleans each line every 2 weeks. Fresh Local Food. This philosophy lies at the heart of our menu features everything from appetizers and salads to wraps, burgers and of course our authentic Greek cuisine with mousaka, pastitzio, laxanodolmades, spanakorizo and .. and our house favourite entrées with tzatziki, taramosalata, dolmades... Come as you are! The welcoming atmosphere is created by our friendly staff, vintage architectural design and great music. beertime is the perfect place for dinner or to celebrate a special occasion. WE LOOK FORWARD TO SHARING OUR PASSION WITH YOU! and... don't miss our Happy Hour: EVERY DAY: 4:00pm - 5:00pm - 2-4-1 on all draught beer
name: BeerTime

description: A little more about us and our dining philosophy Ama Lachei at Nefelis is a traditional greek mezedopoleio, which means is a restaurant that serves meze. Meze is a selection of small dishes, resembling appetizers or tapas. They are served in a random order and are shared by all dining companions. They are not served all together, but each dish arrives at the table as soon as it is prepared. Therefore, there are no starters or main dishes and everyone shares the same small dishes. According to the Mediterranean dining tradition these small dishes are shared between friends and family, while consuming alcoholic drinks, often over the course of an entire evening. The serving of meze is designed to encourage conversation, because people are not so focused upon eating a full course meal set before them. The culture of sharing food brinks people together to communicate and socialize, which makes it a tradition worth exploring...
name: Ama Lachei at Nefeli's
rankingString: #172 of 3,608 places to eat in Athens

description: Welcome to Hill Athens, the all-day restaurant-wine bar in Thiseio (Thissio) with the most tasteful modern Greek cuisine, serving brunch, lunch and dinner. In the night you will enjoy our relaxing rooftop restaurant with a view to the Acropolis and Mount Lycabettus. Hill Athens is a new restaurant, located on Apostolou Pavlou pedestrian, at Thissio, and enjoy the shadow of four historical hills in Athens, from the Ancient years since today, while it offers an amazing view towards them. Hill Athens is something more than a bistrot. It is multidimensional place, which keep up with the needs of its guests, and its target is to offer a modern gastronomic experience with an amazing view of the Acropolis, that goes far beyond the touristic character of the area, and looks into the authentic experience of a modern city with a glorious past.

description: At Karamanlidika Food Artistry Restaurant, you are welcome to enjoy new dishes & “prosfournia”, as were once called -in the Byzantine times- the small loaves of bread which were baked in outdoor fireplaces and ovens. We create “prosfournia” with fresh yeast and virgin olive oil; we bake them in our traditional stone oven which gives them special taste, highlights the aroma and quality of the ingredients. You may also taste & buy rare Greek cheese, aged hams & cold-cuts, hand-made salami and the original “Karmanli pastourma”. Enjoy on the spot or buy unique delicacies of small scale production, exceptional gourmet, PDO and PGA Greek food products. Menu includes salads, cheese & ham varieties, cold and hot dishes & desserts, accompanied by a great selection of fine distilled beverages, Greek beers & AOC wine of local grape varieties. Try traditional Greek pastry & desserts! “Baklava” and “künefe” made with pure butter, sesame “pasteli”, “kazan depe” and “malebi” cream.
name: Karamanlidika Tou Fani - Ermou

description: - Our cooking is based on the quality of raw materials and strict compliance with hygiene regulations during all stages of preparation. - We use pure, authentic materials with an emphasis on fresh seasonal products. We highlight local recipes and use local products. - Alexandra Restaurant is ideal for every event like: Weddings, Baptism, Corporate Dinners and Memorials. There is a special Menu for every occasion. Our bread, a home-made sour-dough loaf, is served hot and is accompanied by two dips: olive paste and tirokafteri (a feta based dip). Our salads are served with traditional virgin olive oil. Our menu includes Choice Greek wine labels at affordable prices and bulk red and white wine served in a carafe. Our fries are fresh, greek, cut in rounds and fried in olive oil. The dishes of "Alexandra" are inspired by the Mediterranean cuisine and we use pure materials of greek origin. A great variety of grilled meats and fish. Deserts: walnut cake, baked quince with vanilla ice-cream and red wine sauce, baked apple with Amaretto and yogurt sauce , chocolate mousse, etc.

description: STOA RAKADIKO, one of the oldest restaurants in Greece: An Inn in an Arcade from 1890 with a resting place for the wheelbarrows and their horses was built in the center of Piraeus Harbor. Travelers could rest, eat and sleep to recover from their long journey. 1900-1970: The Arcade becomes a famous Pireus Shopping Center in the 20th century with a small restaurant and lots of small shops like a Parfume Maker, a Foodmarket, a Tailor etc. Today: We resorated the building an run a Rewarded Restaurant where you enjoy special GREEK Premium food. From slightly smoked TOMAHAWK to CRETAN Salad with cherry tomatoes or small MEZE PLATES like Pan Bread with your Raki.
name: Rakadiko Stoa Kouvelou

description: Welcome to E/G Taxidevontas sta voreia (means sailing north). Our aim is to provide a warm and friendly place where serving our customers is our main goal, where anyone can taste the finest and freshest seafood the Greek seas have to offer at very reasonable prices. Our idea, we want to remind you of your childhood where the flavors were simple but unique. We beleive we have succeded. We would love to have you visit and see for yourselves that our non-negotiable principles are: - The quality of our ingredients. - Respect for our customer's wishes - Cleanliness We are confident that once you visit us once we will have the honour of seeing you again. The crew
name: Taxidevontas Sta Voreia

description:
Ελληνική Ταβέρνα στην καρδιά της Αθήνας. Λειττουργεί από το 1976 και βρίσκεται σε απόσταση αναπνοής από το αρχαιολογικό μουσείο καθώς και τους σταθμούς Ομόνοιας και Πανεπιστήμιο. 
Σχεδόν μισό αιώνα πλέον προσφέρει παραδοσιακά αλλά και μοντέρνα πιάτα με έμφαση στην ποιότητα της πρώτης ύλης. 
Ο Κήπος της Ροζαλίας αποτελεί μια έκπληξη, εντυπωσιάζει με το μέγεθος αλλά και τον κλιματιζόμενο χαρακτήρα του.
Ο Πεζόδρομος της Βαλτετσίου, καταπράσινος και πολύβουος θα σας μεταφέρει σε κλίμα διακοπών σε λίγα μόλις λεπτά!
name: Rozalia

description: James Joyce Irish Pub opened its doors in Athens on 12th October 2007, we consider The James Joyce a different type of Irish pub. We blend the best of the old with the best of the new. Our décor of dark wood, long bar and warm comfortable environment evoke images of the great old pubs of Ireland whereas our style of operating – our music, food and beverages – connects more so with the contemporary pubs and bars of modern Ireland. Our menu is an introduction to traditional Irish favourites from steak & Guinness pie, sausage & mash to fish & chips, but is also influenced by our Greek & Mediterranean neighbours with dishes such as grilled halloumi & our own version of the famous Greek salad, check out our full menu. Our draught beers are undoubtedly the best in town as our Irish management insures that our products are stored and poured to the highest standard. We have the largest selection of Irish whiskies, & also a great range of world whiskies & spirits.
name: The James Joyce Irish Pub & Restaurant

description: The relentless pursuit of the alternative, the qualitative, the substantial way of living, led us to a journey filled with flavors, aromas, sounds and images that we felt the need to share with you.Thus, we created a place full of experience we gathered in our travels and we welcome you in it with a mood as friendly and relaxing as our name.Our menu is focused on quality and value. With that in mind, we use as many bio products as we can for the preparation and creation of the beverage and meals that serve you. We believe in fresh ingredients with the least possible intervention.

description: A neoclassical pedestrian street in the heart of Athens (between Plaka and Syntagma) is home to Kiki de Grèce, the cosy wine bistrot dedicated to Greek wine & bites. The name was inspired by Kiki de de Montparnasse, the French artists muse and artist herself, flourishing in Paris of the early 1920s. Kiki maintained her inventive attitude even in difficult times saying "all I need is an onion, a bit of bread, and a bottle of wine". At the Greek Kiki you can try a selection of Greek wines by the glass, both from established and emerging producers and regions. Kiki's list changes often and showcases various Greek wine-making regions every season- including well-known and rare wines from indigenous varieties. You can accompany your wine with dishes prepared with products sourced from all over the country. Highlights include: Greek Trahana-risotto with Kopanisti cheese from the island of Tinos, Santorini fava with capers and smoked Eel from Western Greece, Cheese cake de Grece with Cretan rusks and island cheese - and many more. Kiki's menu is small yet creative, including salads, appetizers and 4-5 main dishes - and it's updated every season!
name: Kiki de Grece
rankingString: #211 of 3,608 places to eat in Athens

The only restaurant so close to the glorious monument could not but cherish its homeland gastronomical philosophy throughout centuries. address: Vrasida 11 Behind Hilton Hotel, Athens 11528 Greece
description: Vezené is a Greek-inspired bistro by Chef and Butcher Ari Vezené, serving pasture-raised meat and local, sustainably-sourced seafood that is cooked in wood-fired grills and ovens. We are committed to running our restaurant sustainably and ethically, not only because it is the right thing to do, but also because these practices provide the very best quality, flavours and experiences for our valued customers. We practice whole animal butchery, select rare traditional breeds and also meat from older animals, such as retired dairy cattle. We have an extensive wine list featuring both Greek and global varieties, and desserts such as the ever-popular layered ice-cream cake: 'Ari's Deal Closer'. The special Sunday Roast menu, only available on Sundays, is served in epic family-style portions in the middle of the table for everyone to share and enjoy. Vezené is located opposite the Hilton Hotel, and Madrid Square, with views to the Lycabettus Hill, and is very close to the Ilissia Gardens.
name: Vezene Athens
rankingString: #235 of 3,608 places to eat in Athens

description: Back in 1965 two friends came up with the idea to create in the centre of Athens a shop in order to offer to their customers Kalamakia,the authentic greek souvlakia. They also decide to name this shop"Souvlaki Leivadia" because of the reputation which seems to have this particular place for its pork Kalamaki. In this area the majority of people decided to have a short break for a tasty snack as they were traveling to north Greece.In this shop the Kalamaki was served with farmhouse bread which was free and unlimited and for this reason more and more people visited every day. There many of our customers who come and fable to us that when they were students they bought only one Kalamaki and they glutted with a lot of bread those difficult years. So "Souvlaki Leivadia" the authentic greek pork Kalamaki has found its place in the centre of Athens,in the Glastonos and Kaniggos corner. description: A traditional and quant Cafe - Restaurant located in the very heart of Plaka A whole era comes alive for the visitors who wonder around the alleys and the cobbled streats of the picturesque and oldest neighborhood of Athens, Plaka. Among the historic neighborhoods and crowded alleys, you can discover "Anafiotika". No no, we are not talking about Anafiotika area, but about our very own "Anafiotika" !!! The traditional Cafe - Restaurant, as our patrons and visitors call it, "Anafiotika" makes an exception in the street of Mnisikleous and Thrasivoulou. The famous "stairs" as you may have heard!

description:
A stunning restaurant at the rooftop of The Dolli hotel gazing at the Parthenon and the historical Plaka neighbourhood and embracing the vibrant Athens beat.

Authentic culinary surprises, casual chic dining, fusion cuisine flavours and a refined wine list from the world’s leading wine regions to artisan, family-owned vineyards suggested by our sommelier.

Dolli’s Rooftop Restaurant is open daily for lunch and dinner from 13.00 to 23.00. Reservations by email at grel.do@grecotel.com or by phone at +30 2160047000

description: Established in 1972, Trattoria Restaurant has served as a cornerstone of the historic center of Athens, and arguably its heart, Plaka. Tucked away in the picturesque square Filomousos Eteria, it has served for many years, focusing on high quality ingredients in traditional Mediterranean dishes with a predominant feeling for the Italian and Greek cuisine. Service and hospitality, retain a key ingredient to our success and are the reason for staying in business all these years, with customers who visit us again and again.

description: Palia Fava is a traditional Greek Tavern which is located in Palaio Faliro of Athens. It is a family business of Mother Dina , Father Dimitris and son John , so it feels like home with well cooked meals and low prices. Miss Dina has many years of experience in cooking and her biggest goal is to satisfy all customers and try to present them the way a meal and some wine change our mood and make our life better.Most of the ingredients of our cuisine like wine,vinegar,tomatoes,eggplants,rocket,potatoes and fava are produced by son John and Father Dimitris in Santorini Island. Palia Fava has been awarded twice with the Best Greek Tavern Award for 2014 by CosmopolisFinezza and Mission:Life and Style.
name: I Palia Fava

description: Standing out on the 11th floor, the Olive Garden Bar & Restaurant is the "Jewel" of the hotel. The restaurant with the famous "Olive Grove" has incorporated in its logo the "Olive Tree" symbol, inspired by the symbols of Athens and the Greek mythology Goddess Athena. The Olive Garden has been acknowledged as one of the best Restaurants in Athens and has received many awards for its elegant environment and its Greek-Modern comfort cuisine. With a breath-taking romantic view at the Acropolis and the Lycabettus Hill, the Olive Garden Restaurant is aesthetically designed, a fact which becomes evident in the presentation of each dish as well as in its music. The hospitable and charming ambience of the restaurant and the Chef's gastronomic creations are the epitome of every Athenian night, satisfying the most demanding requirements, and offering exquisite flavors and images. Operating hours: Olive Garden Bar: 10:00 - 24:00 Olive Garden Restaurant: 18:00 - 23:45
name: Olive Garden bar & restaurant
rankingString: #301 of 3,608 places to eat in Athens

description: Kosmikon is a family-owned Greek restaurant established in 1966 located at the beautiful and picturesque area of Plaka. Some of our signature dishes are moussaka, stuffed tomatoes and peppers, skewers, roasted vegetables and many more which have been prepared according to the Greek and Mediterranean cuisine. Our passion and care for quality and constant improvement is a changeless value transferred from one generation to the next. By applying our fresh and modern ideas about restaurants and customer care, we have managed to make Kosmikon a leading restaurant in Plaka, and the rest of Athens.
name: Kosmikon Restaurant

description: The pies are produced by simple mixing flour, water, oil, salt and filling materials. The pies are traditional Greek recipes (with the most common tyropittes, the chortopittes, the kreatopittes) with specificities from region to region, depending on local habits and produced local ingredients. The cakes have significant nutritional value since they combine the cheese rich in amino acid lysine, the flour is low in lysine, creating an excellent combination. With the addition of vegetable nutritional value enriched. http://www.grhotels.gr/gb/meleti.pdf The cake is an ancient invention. In ancient Greece famous pies were mytlotes, and ekchytes. The technique was passed in subsequent periods to the present day, with different variations. Our ancestors still manufactured and their breads, compact, with minimal swelling. Flour derived from certain varieties of wheat, einkorn as kaploutzas or emmer and was - is the primary factor that identifies and defines the quality of a pie.
name: Pandora

description: Great variety of "Barley"...with over 290 beer choices, 120+ from Greek microbreweries, exclusive imported choices and 17 Premium on tap served "fresh"straight from the bar-freezing departments. There is a take away option as well!A Beer Bar with industrial " Cargo" decoration...a beer wall, wooden-barrel tables and a huge glass front with a view to passers by walking up and down in Kolokotroni... a street that never sleeps...a sound console for live concerts is added to the design canvas... The house-made snacks with low prices vary from fresh salads, mushrooms, Cretan cheese, Barley Burger, to Apaki (smoked meat), and are all Greek region delicacies! Every month the chef alter the Cargo Food Flights. Beer seminars and monthly exbeeriences dedicated to micro-brewers take place...

address: 73, Doukissis Plakentias St. Nearest Metro: Panormou Station, Athens 115 23 Greece
description: After Mykonos and Santorini Sakura set within the heart of Athens in Panormou. As one of the most authentic and traditional Japanese restaurants, specializing in fresh sushi, sashimi and sushi rolls alongside with the Black Angus beef delicacies. One of just a handful of Japanese restaurants in Athens to offer edomae style sushi and kaizeki creations as well as a wide range of black Angus beef. Our intimate dining room, designed by Konstantinos Kosta, seats 40 for the dinner also stools at the pass offering a fascinating insight into the working of an authentic Japanese kitchen in central Athens. A number of striking design features include a stunning piece of resin artwork positioned in the dark room and an eye-catching light arrangement.
name: Sakura Sushi

description: Just Pita comprises a very special gastronomical choice for lunch and dinner offering an enormous variety of homemade, fresh ingredients, daily prepared and checked in our premises for your total satisfaction. Just Pita is visiting the center of Athens to comprise your day & night thinking regarding your appetite! Start with one of our numerous and various salads and move to the main dish by ordering a hearty, delicious souvlaki, burger, tortilla or the signature cinder-bread (Thrakopsomo), filled with anything from a wide range of ingredients such as burger, pork souvlaki, chicken, chicken wrapped with bacon, kebab, soutzouki, haloumi cheese, sausages, cold meat, fresh vegetables and more! Our kalamakia (steaks with meat of your choice) are handmade with expertise and food knowledge. Call us from noon till midnight and we'll be there to deliver our top quality products and to thrill you with our tastes. Welcome to Just Pita Athens, your daily food bar!
name: Just Pita

description: Authentic Italian flavour in the Athenian center. The all day Italian bistro, located next to the Acropolis, carries the history of authentic Italian pizza and pasta in its comprehensive menu, carefully planned by chef George Galanis.The pizza dough that matures for 48 hours is an exclusive recipe of Meno Male and guarantees an impeccable result for all pizza options on the menu, while its fine selection of pastareflects the freshment and the premium quality of the ingredients, all brought directly from Italy. All dishes go beautifully with the wonderful Greek and Italian labels of the wine list, but cna also match creative cocktails. Meno Male welcomes you all day, every day according to the bistro philosophy, for your coffee, brunch, lunch or dinner.
name: Meno Male

description: By the Glass is an exquisitely designed wine bar right in the heart of Athens in one of the most beautiful old buildings. By the glass serves wine by the glass and allows you to get acquainted with every region of Greece that produces wine of great quality. Meet unique greek wine varieties and get to know the most delicate greek wine-makers. Each variety of wine finds a perfect match in food and our chef has taken care of every little tasty detail, please allow us to introduce you to the greek wines! An all day destination for lovers of both coffee and wine, since By the glass is open during the day serving delicious and artful coffee.
name: By The Glass wine bar & bistrot

description: The Aslanidis family greets you with a warm embrace in the newly opened Greek food place in the Athenian Riviera ! Ksenia and Valerios are like ice and fire of gastronomy, every recipe was elaborated with love and passion for life. Taste and discover delicious traditional and signature dishes from the best chefs in the area. International experience in cooking on par with exceptional master classes with the worlds most rated chefs bring special high gastronomy touch to every plate served at Riviera Kitchen & Grill. Ksenia has her own balcony of herbs, while Valerios is on a hunt for the best meat in Athens. Endless tastings and the most exquisite homemade recipes are here for you! Our delicious homemade deserts will also conquer your heart! Freshest local ingredients , excellent service , authentic atmosphere and best hosts family are waiting for you and your friends at Leoforos Poseidonos, 40 at Alimos. We look forward to serving you the best way possible we can !
name: Riviera Kitchen & Grill

description: The first Warehouse in Athens opened in 2014 at Exarcheia, with a passion for speciality coffee, wine, great food and cocktails. At the corner of Mavromichali and Valtetsiou streets you will find Warehouse, an all-day venue that loves speciality blends, according to us high quality products from all categories. Our coffee is daily roasted at Wisecup Coffee Roasters and comes from speciality, origin and premium coffees from all around the world. You can enjoy your coffee served by our barista or buy your favorite blend to take home. Our wine list includes wines from Greece and the rest of the world by well-known estates, to guest premium wines for private tastings. 200 different wines are served at Warehouse, 70 by the glass and 500 choices for retail in our cellar. Our food menu includes sandwiches, eggs and street food up to dry-aged meat and twisted recipes. Ceviche, carpaccio, orzo pasta with shrimps, beef fillet and daily specials, ask for what suits your taste and we will propose the wine to make it the perfect tasting experience! And if you are passionate about wine and food pairing you can book your own private wine menu. The Warehouse team can create a food menu especially for you as well as the suitable wine pairing. The private wine menu service is available for 4-12 persons. Our bar offers drinks, special distillates, unique premium spirits as well as a full cocktail list with classic and signature recipes that will excite you. Warehouse is a non-smoking wine bar, but if you smoke you can always choose one of the tables at our favorite Valtetsiou sidewalk. We love to change! That is why in April 2017 we opened a second Warehouse in Athens near Syntagma/ Plaka with a focus on sparkling wines. At Warehouse CO2 you can find a great variety of sparkling wines by the glass and by the bottle as well as vintage, awarded and magnum still wines from Greece and abroad. Our menu includes cold dishes, special cheeses, cold cuts and other deli products, which you can also buy for home. Warehouse also serves breakfast to accompany your favorite coffee which is daily roasted at Wisecup Coffee Roasters.
name: Warehouse
rankingString: #375 of 3,608 places to eat in Athens

description: ERGON House is a seventh heaven for food enthusiasts, complete with ‘rooms above the inn’. A spectacular marketplace, a modern-day Agora with a constellation of greengrocers, a butcher’s, fishmonger’s and bakery, a delicatessen and roastery, along with a bar and restaurant which celebrate the best of Greek cuisine culture. And we have expanded on the unique experience of an epicurean boutique hotel by creating cool common ground in which to cook and lounge, a gym for good conscience, as well as a roof terrace planted with olive trees that has unbeatable views of the city.
name: ERGON House

description: Wisdom is the main attribute that defines a Cookoovaya dish. An attribute that lies in the way we make our choices, how we process, how we seek balance, how we implement past knowledge and when and why we innovate. It is where the very essence and taste stems from. Apheresis and moderation define the way Cookoovaya's chef/owner Periklis Koskinas cooks. Greece is an unfailing source of inspiration to him. The abundance of produce, the bright, heart-warming sunlight, the myriads of islands and the symmetry of Greek architecture. Perfect in its simplicity, it doesn't steal the limelight from the natural beauty or contradicts it. It complements it in harmony.
name: Cookoovaya

description: With its name bringing to mind the Prohibition (1931) when the world famous song by Cab Calloway “Minnie the Moocher, the stylish vintage all day bar standing on the pedestrian precinct of Tsakalof Str. A flight of imagination in the interwar period and the era when alcohol consumption was illegal is what inspired by the architect ioannis Karvoutzis. Otherwise “cold” gallery of the in the middle of historical centre of downtown Athens, winning more and more aficionados.. Here we can enjoy our coffee, sophisticated drink labels (with its premium drinks standing at value for money prices) served in vintage crystal glasses, all handpicked in antique shops, and we can listen to special arrangements of jazz, swing, sould and classic rock songs… Thumbs up for the open kitchen with the limited yet intriguing menu, focusing on gourmet finger food, and including cheese/cured meat platters, crostini, handmade Italian style pizza, as well as other dishes! Stay tuned! Drinks€8.
name: Minnie The Moocher - Bar
rankingString: #388 of 3,608 places to eat in Athens

description: Located in Andrianou str., one of the most popular streets in Monastiraki area, Kotili café – restaurant, offers its clients a special dining experience. Just a few minutes away from “Monastiraki” and “Akropolis” metro stations, this unique and beautiful café restaurant will grand you moments of serenity in its beautiful coutyard, where you can enjoy your meal, coffee or drink. The chef’s suggestions such as: Feta Kotyli, Tenderloin Kotyli, the Fisherman's Platter and the variety of the appetizers are really delecious! You will be impressed by the wide variety of the salted preserves, the fresh salads, the handmade sweets with the Banofi as a star. The program with the line Greek musics starts daily at 19:00 pm and the weekends from 13:30 pm The name of the restaurant Kotili is directly connected with Ancient Greece. It was kind of measure and a type of glass. Kotili was also used during religious ceremonies as a sacrificial vessel used by the priest for libations of wine . The friendly and quick service of the restaurant will amaze you! Soon Kotili will be your hot-spot! Have a good time! Visit Kotili café restaurant and you’ll have a special dining experience!
name: Kotili
rankingString: #398 of 3,608 places to eat in Athens

description: At the heart of the city, in the center of Athens, Trattoria Signor Ventiri Grigliata Di Carne opened its doors. The Agora Select team with its experience on restaurants, created the Trattoria Signor Ventiri Cuisine, dedicated to local recipes and the best Greek-Italian flavors. The place is elegant with a magnificent kitchen, which can be either classic or complicated for those who want more, so it is the best choice for every occasion. The restaurant is the best choice not only for business lunches and meetings with friends but also for couples and lunches after work. The restaurant emphasize on high qualitative meats and on the right way of roasting the meat.

description: Our traditional tavern was established in 1882 when grandfather Stamatopoulos opened a grocery store where they also served wine. It has been operating as a regular tavern ever since 1965. The old tavern plakiotiki Stamatopoulos since 1882, located at the foot of the Parthenon Street Lisiou 26, Plaka, in Athens. Very close to the Acropolis metro station and the subway Constitution. You can wander the streets of Plaka. Greek souvlaki, authentic Greek salad, moussaka, some of the dishes can be savored indoors and the big cool garden. We are waiting with a big smile and disposal service and kindness!
name: Stamatopoulos Tavern

description: Αναζητήσαμε και βρήκαμε τις καλύτερες πρώτες ύλες στην Ελλάδα, ενώ παράλληλα επιστρατεύσαμε σύγχρονες και παραδοσιακές τεχνικές. Με αγάπη, μεράκι και συνεχή εκπαίδευση, προετοιμάζουμε και φέρνουμε στο τραπέζι σας πιάτα που μένουν αξέχαστα. Το φαγητό είναι ολιστική εμπειρία. Μόλις περάσετε την πόρτα μας, θα σας προσφέρουμε αυτό που έχετε ανάγκη σε κάθε επίπεδο: Υψηλή γαστρονομία και εκλεκτό κρασί σε ένα ζεστό και όμορφο περιβάλλον. Το άρτια εκπαιδευμένο προσωπικό μας θα σας κάνει να νιώσετε άνετα και ταυτόχρονα θα σας καθοδηγήσει για να επιλέξετε το ιδανικό γεύμα για εσάς, πάντα με βάση τις δικές σας προτιμήσεις. Θα το συνδυάσετε ιδανικά με το κρασί που θα σας προτείνει ο sommelier μας.
name: Wood Restaurant

description:
Perched on the rooftop of the Athens Marriott, e&o Athens has become synonymous with top-quality modern-Asian food served in stylish but casual surroundings. The emphasis is on using the best local produce to create an enticing blend of flavours from China, Japan, Sri Lanka, Malaysia and Thailand.

The resulting food is innovative and fresh, simple yet complex, a winning combination. Market-fresh produce will be expertly crafted into dishes from around the world. A subtle journey for lunch or dinner on one of the only panoramic rooftops in Athens.
Treat your senses to an evening of unparalleled Pan-Asian inspired delicacies, surrounded with impeccable views under the Athenian sky.
name: e&o Athens

Thus, the visitor can choose daily between a carefully selected brunch during breakfast, a tasty and light lunch which is available until late in the afternoon or a full dinner for later. description: Nikkei Restaurant is the first Peruvian restaurant in Greece that opened its doors back on 2015 in the heart of Athens, Kolonaki. On 2015 the restaurant awarded by Tasty Guide Awards as the Best New Restaurant in Athens, while according to Athinorama Bar Awards- Shaker Trophy was ranked No1 for 2015-2016 in the category of Best Bar Restaurant. Along with those two awards, Nikkei also managed to be awarded as one of the top 100 restaurants in Greece. 2017 was a landmark year for Nikkei since, the restaurant exclusively for the summer season decided to expand in a unique outdoors place at Dexameni Square, Kolonaki (Xanthippou 10 & Dinokratous 1), while at the same time in Mykonos (Plateia Agias Kiriakis-Matogiannia).

description: The fish-restaurant “Karavidas” was found on October 14th 2000. The family restaurant rapidly increased its reputation for the fresh fish, the unique fish soup, the fresh seafood plates which includes fresh grilled or boiled octopus, fresh squid, fresh steamed mussels and a lot of other delicious dishes. The experienced chef Vasilios Andriopoulos prepares the meals and takes care of your enjoyment. “Karavidas” (the name in Greek actually means crayfish) has its roots from a small village, called Polistafilo, nearby Preveza. This is the place where, the well-known Greek drink Tsipouro is coming from. The quality of the products and the customer service has the guarantee of the other family members, the father Spiros, the mother Eirini and the three sons, Kostas, Dimitris and Nikos. We are waiting for your arrival in our restaurant.
name: Karavidas

description: Bartesera is the all-day cafe-bar-restaurant in the centre of Athens. Located in the unique atrium of Stoa Praxitelous (25 Kolokotroni Str., a two-minute walk from Syntagma in the centre of Athens), it’s the place to drink refreshing cocktails and cold beer from Greek microbreweries, enjoy well-crafted coffee and try our Greek-inspired fusion cuisine. Listen to the soundtrack of contemporary Athens and meet today’s Greece, the way you never will in tourist guides.
name: Bartesera

description: It all began in 1992, when Alexandros, a young man with passion for the traditional flavors of the oriental cuisine, opened a small restaurant, bringing with him all the secrets and scents of the East. In the kitchen of Aladdin Kebap maintain authentic oriental flavor. Our fresh ingredients are chosen with meticulous daily choice. Cooked in the right way and the right spices to make the finest dishes. Each dish, served at your table is ready to tempt your palate and able to offer you a unique culinary experience.

description:
Molly Malones was the first authentic Irish Pub to be established in Athens. It was opened in Glyfada Athens in December 2003 and quickly became one of the most popular venues in the South Eastern suburb of Athens. Come and enjoy our unique blend of good food and drink in friendly surroundings served by cheerful and welcoming staff.!

“All major sporting events are shown on out large-screen televisions and if there is a particular football match or other event that you would like to see please ask one of the staff if it is available and we will do our best to find it for you.”

description: Inspired by the Izakayas of Japan, GAKU Sushi – Izakaya is an award-winning restaurant that serves Japanese cuisine beyond just sushi. With two restaurants, one in the center of Athens (Syntagma square) and one in the northern suburbs (Chalandri), GAKU offers an all-day menu based on top quality ingredients that give Japanese classics a contemporary twist. With an extensive sake catalog and refreshing cocktails, GAKU offers an award-winning cuisine at reasonalbe prices in an elegant, yet casual setting. GAKU has been awarded a Star at the "FNL Best Restaurant Awards of 2016 and 2017" as one of the best restaurants in Athens.
name: Gaku Sushi - Izakaya @ Syntagma

description: Skyfall is located in Mets, one of the most beautiful areas of Athens. description: Tirbouson in the area of Kerameikos is located in an old machine shop which has been transformed into a bar-restaurant, with a view of the railway and a verandah for the summer season. The decor is colorful and interesting with posters with upcoming events and original objects, a yellow crane, a handmade chandelier made of bottles, five showers dripping light. Jazz, soul, funk, reggae provides lively entertainment for the public of all ages. The menu is based on local ingredients prepared creatively.The wine list includes twenty five different labels and varieties which satisfy all tastes at very reasonable prices. You can also spend the time with a refreshing cocktail or a coffee surfing on the web. Open daily from 6 until 1 and on weekends from 2 in the afternoon. Closed on Mondays.
name: Tirbouson

description: The 1st self-service beer bar in Athens! Berlin by 5 drunkmen is more an innovative beer-bar rather than a traditional beer-restaurant. This awarded bar is located in Pagrati district, an old and worth visiting neighborhood of Athens city centre. What makes this bar unique, is the fact that every table has its own personal taps where you can serve yourself at will, whenever you want. Then, you can see your "score" on the big screen located on the wall! You can also taste fresh finger food and tapas to accompany your beer! A beer bar where you are definitely treated as a local and not as tourist!!
name: Berlin by 5 Drunk Men

description: Plaki sea food bar welcomes you and promises a memorable tasting experience that captures the unique taste of the Mediterranean, Greek Cycladic cuisine, and modern gastronomy, with a focus on seafood dishes. Our restaurant was created to share our passion for seafood gastronomy with you, so we use high-quality fresh local ingredients and fish cooked in a Japanese robata. Exquisite seafood flavors, full of unforgettable aromas and colors, come together to compose and highlight our highly aesthetic and tasteful dishes that will satisfy and excite your palate. You can watch in our open kitchen the dishes come to life before your eyes by our chef and therefore participate with us in this unique creative process! We will be waiting for you from the morning to enjoy your coffee or drink in our cozy bar until the evening when we will travel you with friends to delicious destinations that musk the sea and Greece, in our beautifully decorated both indoor and outdoor space!
name: Plaki Sea Food Bar
rankingString: #503 of 3,608 places to eat in Athens

description: On the rooftop of Cava Nektar, one is invited to discover an impressive Mediterranean gastronomic experience with intense fusion influences. This blends harmoniously with the endless cave of hard-to-find spirits with the signature of Cava Nektar in the impressive space of Chelona. The unique rooftop of the restaurant, which is emitting an exotic character, always makes a strong impression with the dominant deeply green scenery, while jazz rhythms light up the atmosphere of our evenings, and the premium cocktail list stands out. Cava Nektar’s renowned sommelier will be at the restaurant to give his suggestions on the ideal wine to match the courses you have chosen! You can also schedule your own corporate dinners or meetings at the restaurant of Chelona.
name: Chelona Athens

description: Michelin star-awarded Soil restaurant, nestled in the vibrant neighbourhood of Pangrati, reveals a unique fine dining experience conceived by the pioneering chef, Tasos Mantis. From a beautiful neoclassical residence in Athens located behind the historical Panathenaic Stadium, the creative chef’s dishes are full of surprises yet firmly rooted in an earthen philosophy that perfectly embodies Mantis’ love for nature. Soil’s journeys begin miles away, in the Chef’s own garden in Alepochori, and continues uninterrupted at Soil with Mantis leveraging sustainability, botanology and farm-to-table dining in the Athenian culinary hotspot. With the freshest ingredients and one of the finest wine lists in the capital, Soil proposes an innovative dining experience rooted in nature, from the heart of Athens.
name: Soil Restaurant

description: Warehouse in a bubble! The Warehouse name is already known and loved for speciality coffee, variety in wines from all around the world, creative food and exciting cocktails. In 2014 the first Warehouse opened in Exarchia at the corner of Mavromichali and Valtetsiou streets. We now have one more reason to love Warehouse…bubbles! Warehouse CO2 opened in April 2017 at Syntagma-Plaka to bring the bubbles to our lives and tickle our daily routine! At Warehouse CO2 you can choose from a wide variety of sparkling wines from all around the world by the glass, by the bottle and to take home. Sparkling and semi-sparkling wines from Greece, prosecco, Moscato d'Asti and Franciacorta from Italy, Cava from Spain, champagne from France, but also unexpected origins such as England or Tasmania. Still wines stay in the list at CO2 but come in more special editions. Magnum bottles, vintage and awarded wines stand out in this category. Our food menu includes dishes with unexpected taste combinations as well as deli products, such as cheese and cold cuts, which are served to eat in or buy retail. From bruschettas and gourmet sandwiches to beef carpaccio with black truffle flakes and beetroot with trout eggs, Warehouse's chef Vassilis Geogleris promises once more a unique tasting experience. In our menu you will also find breakfast options to accompany your favorite speciality or single origin coffee from around the world, which is daily roasted at Wisecup Coffee Roasters.
name: Warehouse CO2
rankingString: #517 of 3,608 places to eat in Athens

description:
A healthy vegetarian Syrian restaurant. All of our food is cooked with love by our family, using the same recipes from generations to generations in our restaurants in Syria, Turkey and Greece! 
Most of our dishes are vegan or can be changed to if asked, don't hesitate to mention it when ordering!
We are a social restaurant training and hiring vulnerable groups in Athens since 2020. We also provide catering for events since 2021 for conferences, parties, etc.

address: 56 Agias Lavras Ano Patisia, Athens 111 41 Greece
description:
Enthymion is a warm and welcoming place, made with a lot of love, housed in a mansion in Kypriado since 1995.

Piano melodies, selected from the Greek and foreign repertoire, accompany your dinner every Friday and Saturday, making it special and special.

On winter Sunday afternoons, from November to May, we are open for you to enjoy our dishes and our hospitality with your company.

On beautiful summer evenings, the tables "go out" to the terrace and the blooming garden, an image separate from the nobility and glamor of those houses!

Our chef Annivas Pitylakis changes the menu four times a year, giving you the opportunity to enjoy the flavors and aromas of each season!
name: Enthymion

description:
Vittoria Gati operates as a modern all-day Italian Brasserie with an inherent New York influence embedded in the décor and food. On the menu you will find fresh handcrafted pasta and Black Angus tagliatta, while their 5-day fermented pizza is baked in a wood-fired oven. There is also an extensive wine list and a team of mixologist creating unique cocktails.
For your convenience, you are advised to book in advance.

description: Εξαιρετικής ποιότητας πρώτες ύλες, χρόνια εμπειρίας και αυθεντική φιλοξενία αποτελούν τις αξίες πίσω από το SOSU. Ένα εστιατόριο Μεσογειακής κουζίνας με επίκεντρο την απλότητα, το σεβασμό στις καθαρές γεύσεις και τη χρήση Ελληνικών προϊόντων από μικρούς παραγωγούς, όπως το ελαιόλαδο, το κρασί, τα βότανα, το σαφράν, το μέλι, το ταχίνι, το γιαούρτι, η φέτα, τα μπαχαρικά, αλλά και τα λαχανικά και τα φρούτα της κάθε εποχής με σκοπό παλιοί και νέοι φίλοι να απολαύσουν, να γελάσουν, να θυμηθούν και να χαρούν ένα μαγειρικό ταξίδι με γνώμονα την απόλαυση, με αφετηρία το κέντρο του Πειραιά. Σας καλωσορίζουμε και σας περιμένουμε να ζήσετε την άψογη εξυπηρέτηση και την εκλεπτυσμένη γαστρονομία του SOSU!
name: Sosu Mediterranean Restaurant

description: One of the most beautiful; places in Athens was entirely renovated by the inspired interior designer Nicolaou Alexandra. A modern place with a distinctive style dominated by wood, plain lines and earthy colours. Interim tables and large comfortable armchairs, giving you the opportunity to relax and enjoy the endless blue of the sea. Best time of the day…. the sunset. Istioploiokos provides an amazing panoramic view, where you can see the sun fading out into the sea. Regardless of the weather and season this place will create memories for a lifetime.

description: Our chef Manolis Thliveros, with vast experience and love for Greek and Mediterranean cuisine curated menu of our restaurant of Kappari Thiseio. The chef only insists on fine Greek products and creates imaginative dishes from Cretan apaki, cabochon saganotyri from Chios, vasilotyri from Zagoria, smoked eel from Epirus (among others) and "stirring" the seasonal vegetables, with meat, poultry , pasta and seafood offers tasty and creative Greek dishes. But our chef innovates also in 'sweets' with an original salad with strawberry sauce and mastelo Chios ...

description: At the crowded district of Psiri, in the year 2007 a small and original bar which stood out from all the others was established going by the name of Minibar. In its late years it has become an elegant and hospitable bistro where the visitor can comfortably enjoy his coffee or tea with brunch and homemade sweets. The menu continues with rich dishes and “meze” of the modern Mediterranean cuisine accompanied with an aroma of the east, beer for all tastes from Greece’s microbreweries ,drinks and quality music. Minibar blends and combines perfectly in Athens most renowned and charismatic urban neighborhoods, a neighborhood filled with color, cafes, bars , rbnb, patisseries, fashion boutiques , artists, tattoo studios , graffiti . Welcome to Psiri, welcome to Minibar. A true downtown experience.
name: Minibar bistro
rankingString: #610 of 3,608 places to eat in Athens

description: ASIAN FUSION IN ATHENS Buba is the Buddha of Athenian suburbia. A bar and restaurant in Kifissia that transports you to the Far East. An oasis of oriental flavours, exotic cocktails, and eclectic beats dished up in tropical surroundings. Inspired by the vibrant colours and aromas of Asian night markets, our open kitchen is a celebration of street food from Thailand, Vietnam, and Hong Kong. Steaming broths and zingy salads, bouncy noodles and plump dumplings, sizzling stir-fries and fragrant curries are all made with fresh market produce. WELCOME TO THE HOUSE PARTY! In the spirit of a Bangkok supper club, our Athenian townhouse is dressed up in clashing prints and oriental trinkets. There's a room for every occasion. Copper lights cast a sepia tint over the mahogany bar. Draped in hanging plants, our secret garden evokes memories of exotic adventures. Decked with a kaleidoscope of paper lanterns, our private dining room is an intimate setting for exceptional events.
name: Buba Bistrot Exotique
rankingString: #22 of 222 places to eat in Kifissia

description: When in the early 1950s, Rex Warner (author, translator, director of the British Institute in Athens) referred to his book Views of Attica and its surroundings, to then-owner George Psara, his delicious retsina and his traditional Greek. dishes, personalities from around the world, such as Lawrence Olivier and Vivian Lee, Margot Fontaine, Graham Greens, Melina Mercouri, Manos Hadjidakis, etc., enjoyed the hospitality and quality that only “The Tavern Fisherman ‘can offer. So for those who want to feel a little of the aura of these people, enjoying a great atmosphere of premium quality Greek cuisine, stop in at the Fisherman’s Tavern and you will surely get a new hangout.

address: Karneadou 29 Ploutarchou & Karneadou Kolonaki, Athens 106 75 Greece
description: Athinaia Restaurant Café Wine Bar in Kolonaki renewed with modern mood at Ploutarchou & Karneodou Street. Athenaia Restaurant is a cool place during the summer months with great food, with emphasis on Greek cuisine based on the Modern Mediterranean suggestion on the favorite tastes of old Athens. Athinaia's chefs use new techniques and trends in cooking, local products and materials, creating tastes of today, preserving the 60-year tradition of Athenaeum. The menu includes food such as Appetizers, Salads, Main Dish, Dessert, and you can start your meal with Athenaean Salad with Roast Manouri, Dried Fruit and Pomegranate Vinaigrette and Smoked Eggplant with Peppers of Florina. The prices are incredibly affordable in the Athenian restaurant are not in line with the luxurious environment the impeccable and friendly service and the quality of its raw materials. Guarantee of years in focus and entertainment with the signature of the businessman Argyris & Nasos Papargyropoulos.
name: Athinaia
rankingString: #651 of 3,608 places to eat in Athens

description: Eat well - Drink well - Shop well - Do good! SHEDIA HOME is a gift shop, café - bar - restaurant & hub of social solidarity and innovation. We are a social and environmental project where the ideals and values of love, solidarity, education, participation, social inclusion, creativity, social enterprise, innovation as well as social and environmental awareness are all converging. It is about providing social solutions in a sustainable way, while offering inspiration as well as high quality goods and services. Powered by the Greek street paper Shedia. Opening hours: Monday-Thursday and Sunday 08:30 in the morning until 00:30 at night Friday and Saturday 08:30 in the morning until 01:00 at night.

description: The only place in Athens that serves original, Venetian Cicchetti (savoury, bite-sized snacks) made with traditional recipes from both Italy and Greece. Panini (sandwiches) in a variety of bread types and premium cold cuts and cheeses from selected, small farms and co-ops, from both Italy and Greece.  As a part of our "Bring at Home Experience"  philosophy, all the products used in our recipes, can be sold separately!  Especially the Italian "Le Tamerici" gelatine and mostarde, which accompany cold cuts and cheeses, are sold EXCLUSIVELY at Cicchetto Cantina.
name: Cicchetto Cantina

description: Nestled in the heart of Kolonaki, in the small pedestrian area of Milioni, the M8 welcomes you to enjoy our tasty cuisine, drinks and coffee specialties, putting this famous street back on the map. At M8 it is our pursuit to combine modernity, class and passion with excellent service and great tastes. From morning to night, we will surprise you with our tasty delicacies and exceptional food creations as well as with our extraordinary selection of beverages, coffees and drinks, accompanied by the soft sounds of music. Enjoy and experience the spirit and ambience of M8, designed to be modern yet elegant, lively yet homelike – a specific flair only to be found in Kolonaki. It’s a place catering to all tastes and ages - the perfect hideaway to forget the stressful means of the city!
name: M8 . Kolonaki

description: Seafood restaurant at the heart of Mikrolimano, in Piraeus since 2006. Here you will enjoy fresh fish, juicy seafood and delicious treasures of the Greek seas, directly from the trawl. It is no coincidence that it became the #1 destination for domestic seafood lovers and visitors from all over the world. AMMOS means sand... The location and the decor of AMMOS offer the sense of a picturesque island-style tavern that almost floats in the sea! Bright white, shades of blue, all the colors of the Aegean sea dominates and conspires to travel you mentally to the sandy beaches of the Greek islands. Amongst the many delicious sea temptations are the stuffed sardine, the smelt, the delicious seafood risotto, accompanied by fine tsipouro and scented ouzo.
name: Ammos
rankingString: #53 of 452 places to eat in Piraeus

description: The sun, the sea, deep blue caldera... island's images within a steep rocky landscape and a breathtaking sunset compose the unique Imerovigli of Santorini. The sung in many Greek folk songs, Peiraiki, has its own Imerovigli. With a feeling of nostalgia for the tradition, but at the same time in full sync with the modern, it keeps going in the spirit the times. With a magnificent view of the Saronic Gulf, in a space where the island mood is dominant and with more diverse and affordable options than ever, one would only be troubled, when deciding what to order. Fresh fish, directly from the local fishermen, seafood appetizers as well as delicious choices for the meat eaters, all of them prepared with respect to tradition. Rich variety of Greek wines, ouzo, tsipouro, beer and Cretan raki. And finally, let's not overlook our musicians, who will keep you company and raise your mood with their music.
name: Imerovigli
rankingString: #59 of 452 places to eat in Piraeus
